name: Stay-Awhile  at Lovers Pt. Pacific Grv
description:
The space
Very charming and artistic little house located near one of California's most beautiful locations in historic Pacific Grove. Pet Friendly and available for stays of 28 days or more 2018.This house was photographed for Carmel Magazine in Feb.09 for its Pacific Grove edition. an easy walk to many restaurants, coffee shops, antique shops,movie theater, farmers market, natural history museum, golf and the beach. Two blocks from Lover's Point Park, Caledonia park, beach and the coastal recreation trail where you can bike or rent surreys, kayaks and paddleboards. This small Cottage has One bedroom with French antique bed, down comforter, crystal chandelier and mirrored dresser ,kitchen has a functional antique wedgewood stove and Breville multi function oven, kitchen appliances and a sunny coffee spot or reading nook. House has hardwood and cork flooring. Comfy pooch friendly couch and dining room with extendable table. Tile shower/tub.Private backyard deck and seatin
host_about:
I love living near the ocean here in Pacific Grove and walk daily with my dogs on the beach.I am a hair stylist and own a salon in Carmel, I own and renovate old houses and love to travel to tropical places. I enjoy walking to great restaurants and the  Farmer's market all within two blocks. This is the perfect location!
I hope your wanderings lead you to places you love.

name: Ocean front 6-bedroom masterpiece
description:
In May 2015, Trip Advisor chose Pacific Grove as one of the top scenic destinations in all of the United States! We are very proud of this honor, and it came from reviews by guests who stayed at my home and others in town. You will love it here! We operate with Pacific Grove Transient Use License #83.

The space
No need to fight over who gets the ocean view in this fabulous 6-bedroom, 4-bath home! With 270 degrees of blue-water views, four of the bedrooms have full views of the Pacific and Monterey Bay. The fifth and sixth bedrooms have a quiet, courtyard view just in case somebody doesn't like to go to sleep to the sound of the waves, or watch the moon sinking into the sea at night.
We are minutes from Carmel and Cannery Row in Monterey, and Pebble Beach is our neighbor.
We have a fully stocked gourmet kitchen - and the cook gets an ocean view, too. Dining table seats 10, 14 with extension. Foosball, pinball, Legos, ping pong and lots of o
neighborhood_overview:
I call Pacific Grove "Iowa with a Beach". It is a really friendly small town with everything you need within 1 mile of the house. We have a lovely Farmers Market, Natural History Museum, Movie Theater, shops, restaurants, wildlife and butterflies!
In May 2015, Trip Advisor chose Pacific Grove as one of the top 12 Scenic Destinations in all of the United States. You will love it here!
host_about: I love sharing my home with families on vacation or folks having a reunion or people celebrating a special event.

name: Modern Victorian with ocean view (30 day minimum)
description:
Long-term rental only! (30 day minimum).

The space
Hello!

We will be subletting our incredible home in Pacific Grove. We are looking for long-term renters.

This house has a full Gourmet Kitchen and wrap around porches two blocks from the beach and bike path. Fall is seriously the best moths to be in Pacific Grove, the fog melts away and the weather is warmer than the popular summer months.

We are offering the master bedroom with tempurpedic King sized bed and master bath along with the kitchen and a small bedroom.

You are a person that appreciates good style, global perspective, and culture. Appreciates the beauty of the Peninsula and the outdoors. Respectful of maintaining the cleanliness of the property and enjoys peace and quiet.

Please respond with a little about yourself and any further questions you may have.

Pacific Grove Awaits!!

neighborhood_overview: Our home is in a centrally located and within walking distance to beach town aquarium and Cannery Row.
host_about:
I love to travel. Every summer I visit my family in Germany and Italy. I am a Graphic Designer, so I work wherever I go. I love design which reflects my home, which is clean simple, lots of light and photography. I love photography as well and my daughter followed into my footsteps and got a degree at Brooks Institute, so be prepared to see beautiful art. 
My life's motto: you cant figure out life you have to live it! ;)

Enjoy!

description:
I am a Superhost on Airbnb and have been for the past 3 years. Fabulous home in Pacific Grove with distant views of the ocean from my home perched up on the hill in Pacific Grove, huge outdoor Jacuzzi, huge stone fireplace and back deck, new large gas grill, gourmet kitchen, grand piano, 70" flat screen TV, near great restaurants and kept immaculate. The house is a fun, unusual home with lots of surprises around every corner.

It includes a high-end spa with waterfalls, powerful jets, and huge (seats 8) complete with a view of the ocean and gardens. You can hear your favorite music from the indoor/outdoor Bose sound system while sipping wine in the jacuzzi talking to your best friend, loved one, or family member. You will l
neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quiet. I have wonderful, very kind, and helpful neighbors. The neighborhood is away from the tourist traffic. You will feel like you are in one of the last small town ocean front communities in the US, yet very close to lots of activity that you may wish to venture to.
host_about: I love life. I really enjoy when guests that stay at my house have a wonderful time. I am a people pleaser. I love beautiful things. I love to travel. I enjoy the finer things in life. And, I am constantly working to make the home more amazing!

name: Ocean View Townhome at Lover's Pt.
description:
Breathtaking panoramic picture postcard views await your arrival! Our home is undoubtedly the most amazing ocean view property on the Monterey Bay and it is centrally located to everything Pacific Grove, Monterey and Carmel have to offer.

The space
Walk just one and a half blocks to all of Pacific Grove's great restaurants and shops. View the most amazing underwater sea creatures and wildlife at the world famous Monterey Bay Aquarium less than a mile away in Cannery Row. Take a stroll along the oceanfront recreational trail or soak up the sun on the white sand beach of Lover's Point. There is so much to do and so much to see...and you're right in the center of it all!

Our home has been professionally decorated and features beautiful furniture and accessories. From the Ralph Lauren leather chairs to the granite countertops you will enjoy luxury in every room. The living room has a large LCD flat screen TV for you to enjoy all of your favorite shows. Th
neighborhood_overview: The ocean, restaurants, shops and Lovers Point!
host_about:
We are the typical California family with busy lives that take us in all directions at the same time. When we play, we play hard and try to do it all whenever possible. Our vacation time is no different. We try to experience everything we can during the day and relax at night.

We enjoy Pacific Grove and all the activities that the area has to offer like the Monterey Bay Aquarium, the ocean and beach, Carmel, Big Sur, Santa Cruz, and all the fabulous dinning opportunities. Being a family, variety is important and Monterey Bay provides something for everybody!!

name: John Steinbeck's Cottage 30-Night Minimum Stay
description:
'I bought a small house and garden in Pacific Grove...' (John Steinbeck: A Life in Letters). American author John Steinbeck wrote these words to a friend about this charming house he called home in the 1940s.

This cottage was featured in Country Living: "You'll Never Guess Which Classic American Author's Cottage is For Rent."

The minimum stay is 30 nights and pay no city tax.

The space
Currently, there is construction at our next door neighbor's house. The work is being done Monday - Friday during the day. Please be aware that there will be some noise during the day.

This quaint and charming home, known as The Steinbeck Cottage, has a beautiful living room with a tent cathedral ceiling. Its focal point is the fireplace, richly adorned with carvings of birds and flowers.

It has a sofa, two reading chairs and a flatscreen TV. There is a large bedroom, accommodating a queen bed, a sitting area and a cozy electric fire
neighborhood_overview:
The property is in a quiet residential neighborhood in Pacific Grove. It offers plenty of street parking.

As for the city, Pacific Grove has been called “Butterfly Town U.S.A.,” “The Most Romantic City in the U.S.,” “A Dreamy California Destination, ” as well as an idyllic place to get married, to honeymoon or to just hang out. Some of it is self-proclaimed, some the acclaim of people who have actually visited Pacific Grove.

You will find Pacific Grove on the very tip of the scenic, tree-shrouded Monterey Peninsula with a rocky coastline and an ambiance of charm, grace and beauty.

Founded in the 1870s as a Methodist summer retreat, Pacific Grove still bears the look and feel of yesteryear. As you stroll the residential streets admiring the charm of home after home, you will notice little plaques on many of the homes that bear the name of the original owner and the year in which it was built. To qualify for a plaque from the Heritage Society of Pacif
host_about:
We eloped in Central Park in New York City and love the simplicity of what life brings.  We enjoy exploring new things.  Whether it’s new foods, places to visit or experiences, we love the adventure of life.  Most of all, we love time with each other, our kids, family and friends.  

Pacific Grove is our home away from home, as it gives us a chance to get-away from our busy high-tech jobs.   Who can resist the beautiful coastline, historic Cannery Row and all of those cute seals and sea otters playing in the ocean?   

We were lucky enough to purchase the home of John Steinbeck, American author and Pulitzer Prize winner, and have poured our labor of love in renovating these 100 year-old cottages.

When Steinbeck resided here he formulated the plot of The Grapes of Wrath, and wrote several books including The Sea of Cortez.  This is the home he shared with his second wife, Gwyn Conger, who would become the inspiration for the lead antagonist, Kate Trask, in his epic novel, East of Eden.  In a letter to a friend, Steinbeck wrote of the cottages, “It is a pleasant little house, and we miss it… You’ll find you get a lot of thinking done in that house.” ' (from John Steinbeck, A Life in Letters).  

We are excited to share this wonderful piece of history with you and know you will enjoy your stay.

description:
This room features a comfy queen bed with smart TV and couch. Free AQU passes during your stay. For guests who stay one day only allowed use on that day. You will share a 1.5 bath with 2 Airbnb guests.
Licensed rental: License #428

The space
The home is located in the most desirable area of Pacific Grove, on a quiet street. There are no houses across the street. The bedrooms you will be staying in is on ground floor; The shared bathroom is across your room.The half bathroom is next living room.
PLEASE DO NOT BOOK ONE NIGHT RESERVATIONS WITHOUT ASKING IN ADVANCE. We rarely accept one night reservations on weekends or accept one night reservations more than a week or two (depending on season) in advance or if there is an empty night between bookings. Note pricing varies according to seasons, weekends and special events.
Pacific Grove is often called Butterfly Town, U.S.A. because it is an annual nesting spot for migratory monarch butterflies as t
neighborhood_overview: PG is a neighborhood of unique housing and very friendly people. The neighborhood has a historical downtown of local shops, a movie theater, local galleries and restaurants featured with American, Mexican, Japanese and Chinese styles.
host_about: I live in Pacific Grove with my family(my husband, step-son, and daughter). We love traveling and meeting people of different cultures. After moving to this new house, we decided to host travelers in our home from time to time and share our experience with each other. Please come and visit us! We can not wait to share with you the history and charming scenic spots of Monterey Bay, as well as great hikes, varied local restaurants, featured local galleries, and many other interesting things to do in the area. We are looking forward to helping you enjoy the beauty of the historic Monterey Peninsula and surrounding areas.

description:
Large master bedroom has a spacious comfy king bed with mattress warmer and accomodates two quite nicely. It includes a private entrance with a combo lock, a private bath and sitting/dining area. A cozy electric fireplace can be used for warmth on chilly nights and mornings or just for ambience. It is tastefully decorated with a forest theme to make you feel right at home just a few blocks from beautiful Asilomar Beach!

The space
You’ll feel right at home in the spacious master bedroom with all of the creature comforts. Complimentary coffee and tea, a mini fridge and microwave.

What makes this space unique is the location and the forest theme which makes you feel like you are in a wooded forest, yet you have all the comforts of home.

Guest access
Guests will have access to a private bathroom, private sitting area, private entrance with a combo lock, wifi, and Roku tv with over 500,000 options for television. Laundry servic
neighborhood_overview: What I love about the neighborhood is that it is safe, scenic, a couple blocks to the beach, a short walk to Pebble Beach's Spanish Bay and Seventeen Mile Drive and right around the corner from Asilomar Conference Grounds, a five minute drive to downtown Pacific Grove and Lover's Point, a ten minute drive to Monterey and the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, and the Fisherman's Wharf, a fifteen minute drive to Downtown Carmel and only a forty five minute drive down scenic Hwy 1 to beautiful Big Sur.  Activities in the area include great restaurants and dining, world renown golfing, hiking, biking, walking the scenic coastline, wine tasting, whale watching, kayaking, surfing, scuba diving, art galleries, and the list goes on.
host_about: I have lived on the Monterey Peninsula for thirty two years and have practiced as a Massage Therapist for twenty five years.  I enjoy living in places that offer an abundance of natural beauty and I walk the coastline almost every day with my dogs never taking for granted how blessed I am to be here.  I have traveled to Korea, Japan, Hong Kong, Australia, New Zealand, Canada, Mexico and many places in the United States and have always found it interesting to learn about different cultures and people.  I enjoy cooking as well as a good meal out, receiving massages as well as giving them, time with family and friends, reading a good book, watching a good movie and meeting new and interesting people.  My life motto is to enjoy the journey!

description:
You'll fall in love with the quaint town of Pacific Grove where we built our beautiful bungalow located in an upscale quiet neighborhood. Our bungalow is steps away from the beach recreation trail leading to Lovers Pt and Monterey.

The space
You'll fall in love with the quaint town of Pacific Grove where we just built our beautiful beach bungalow located in an upscale quiet neighborhood. Our beach bungalow is steps away from the recreation trail that leads to Lovers Point beach and nearby restaurants. Take the trail a little further and you arrive at the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row. The famous 17-mile Drive starts at the next street corner and leads to Asilomar, Pebble Beach, Carmel, Carmel by the Sea, and Carmel Valley.

You can park your car at the steps on the right side of the driveway.

name: Lovely House in Pacific Grove (Long term rental)
description:
This lovely remodeled home has 3 bedrooms, den, 2 baths, an office and one car garage. The driveway can fit additional 3 or more cars. It has a secluded outdoor living space with a gas grill. The house can easily accommodate 8 adults comfortably. Centrally located and it is 1 block from the Pebble Beach country club gate entrance and about 1 mile from the Aquarium, Cannery Row, Lover's Point, and downtown PG.
Minimum stay of 30 days.

The space
Welcome! Beautifully remodeled home located in the heart of Pacific Grove in Del Monte Forest. Steps to Pebble Beach entrance, walk to Spanish Bay, a miles from the Monterey Bay Aquarium, lots of natural light, fully furnished, fully stocked kitchen, a small office, living room with fireplace, a lovely and secluded outdoor living space with a gas BBQ, and plenty of parking spaces on the premises.
The master bedroom has its private bath while the other 2 rooms will share a bathroom. Each room can accommodate
neighborhood_overview: Enjoy the small-town charm of Pacific Grove as you explore the many shops and restaurants of this Central Coast town. With the world famous 17 miles drive and Pebble Beach as your back drop, you can experience why some have called this region as the  paradise on earth. There are endless things to do such as biking or hiking through the beautiful trails along the beach; kayaking, snorkeling, or scuba diving in the Monterey Bay. Don't forget to discover the dramatic exhibits at the Monterey Bay Aquarium or historic Cannery Row. Another great area attraction for fine dining and souvenirs is the Monterey Fisherman’s Wharf where some of the country’s best seafood and clam chowder are served.
host_about:
I am an engineer working in the Silicon Valley.  My wife and I have been married for over 30 years.  We enjoy biking, hiking, skiing, and traveling all over.  We love the Monterey and Pacific Grove area ever since we took our two kids on a bike trailer going through 17 miles drive when they were just babies.  We bought this house in Pacific Grove and we like to share this beautiful area with other folks from all over the world. 

Our motto in life is:  work hard and play even harder.

name: Casa Rustica, Walk to Aquarium,Cannery Row,Rest
description:
Our home is located up the hill on David Ave...a short 5 minute walk to the Aquarium and Cannery Row. The home has been remodeled/upgraded. Pet friendly on a case by case basis.Additional pet fee of $250/month will be charged.

The space
Remodel/Upgrade 2015. This woodsy home is on a lot with another 2 bedroom/2 bathroom cottage (Casa Amarilla), which is also available for 30 day minimum stay. For multiple family/larger or corporate groups accommodations, both homes are available to rent for the same time period.

The home is approximately 1,800 square feet, 3 large bedrooms, 2 full bathrooms (1 bathroom in master suite with tub), living room, dining area, fully equipped kitchen, fireplace, and a fenced private flagstone patio/deck area, with partial views of the Monterey Bay, and forced air heating. Duel pane windows/doors...well insulated and quiet.

Wood flooring throughout. Vaulted ceilings, several skylights, recessed lighting, mirro
neighborhood_overview: Traditional Monterey neighborhood...character, butterflies & Cypress trees.  Get out and walk the 1st State Capital of California.  Abundant Marine creatures. Something going on most every weekend. Car buffs galore.
host_about:
Over the years, I have been fortunate to have rubbed elbows with some of the most talented people in the Hospitality and Real Estate professions.  Little did I know these mentors would prepare me for my Vacation Rental venture this year.

I've also discovered my inner gift for interior decorating.  Casa Amarilla has been a labor-of-love restoring and modernizing this quaint Monterey Cottage...a stone throw from the Aquarium.

My green thumb came back to life as well.  The patio and fenced garden area has blossomed this spring, and soothes one's sole at the end of an active day.  A wood burning pot belly fire-pit and charcoal BBQ enhance this spacious artistic zen-like garden, while taking in the distant Monterey Bay view...our guests favorite!

While staying at Casa Amarilla, don't hesitate to call or text me if you and your group need anything at all!

Sincerely,
Guita

name: Peaceful Cozy Beach Cottage
description:

Unfortunately, we will only accept long term rentals which is more than 28 days due to the local regulations after May 2020.

The space
The cottage includes a bright and cheery floor plan that includes beautiful hardwood floors throughout the living room with a partial ocean view, dining room, kitchen and entertainment room that opens into the backyard patio area.

There are 2 bedrooms and 1 bath with 1 queen size bed and 2 twin size beds.

The bathroom awaits you with a bathtub and tile floors.

Guest access
Full kitchen with use of refrigerator, microwave, toaster oven, gas range/oven and coffee maker. In addition, there is a washer and dryer provided as courtesy in the garage for your convenience.

Free Wi-Fi is available as well
neighborhood_overview:

Sunsets, Monarch butterflies, whale watching, sea otters, marine life, golfing, scuba diving, cycling, walking, relaxing and shopping are all within your reach.

name: Little Lighthouse — Ocean views & close to town!
description:
Little Lighthouse Cottage — Ocean views, on the main street of downtown Pacific Grove, newly renovated & ready to call home for your next, extended beach vacation. Two blocks from the ocean and a short stroll to town, Lover's Point and the famous Cannery Row.

Receive 60% off the nightly rate for stays of 31 days or more, and pay no city occupancy tax!

The space
This darling cottage, known as Little Lighthouse, is the lower cottage in a two-unit, WWII-era Carriage House. She has stood through over seventy years of history, and gathered stories in her rooms of love, friends and family. After months of renovation, this lower cottage, Little Lighthouse, is ready for rent. It sits in the beautiful retreat neighborhood of Pacific Grove.

The quaint downtown of Pacific Grove is just a six minute stroll down the street to the right as you exit the front door. A less than 15-minute walk in the other direction takes you to historic Cannery Row and The
neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove offers an unparalleled quality of life. Sharing borders with the Monterey Bay, City of Monterey, Pacific Ocean, and the Del Monte Forest, our town offers breathtaking views and recreational activities. The City provides services to the community including: excellent fire, emergency, and ocean rescue services; an award-winning natural history museum; the lowest crime rate of any city in Monterey County; a nationally-recognized 18-hole golf course; a monarch butterfly habitat sanctuary; sandy beaches; and, the oldest continuously-operating lighthouse on the west coast. We are known for our small-town hospitality and friendliness in a place we simply call 'P.G.' (from The City of Pacific Grove website)
host_about: Meet the family! ... Gary (Dad), Jim (Stacey's Husband), Stacey (Daughter), Lynea (Mom), Amy (Daughter), and Michael (Amy's husband). We have always had a deep love of family togetherness and making memories. We built our family cabin in Arnold in 1983, and bought a darling carriage house in Pacific Grove  together in 2014.  We poured all our love and care into renovating it—to create a special retreat not only for our family, but for yours. We believe that memories shared are some of the most precious times in life. Please come for a visit and share some of yours with us!

name: Peaceful Space near DLI + Cannery Row
description:
Connected to main house, yet quiet and private.
Separate entrance.
Large Tub/Shower.
TV, Refrigerator, Coffee maker.

Close to Stores, Restaurants, Beaches, Aquarium, DLI.

The space
Queen size bed, small couch. Powerful wall heater. Flat panel TV. Small refrigerator. Large shower and tub.

Guest access
Guests access is granted to the room and outside paths to the bordering streets. Kitchen use and laundry, just call and let us know, it should be no problem.

Other things to note
We encourage our guests to park in the carport or driveway. The carport is small, but two small to medium cars can fit side by side. Park as close to the house as possible without blocking anyone else's vehicle.

To minimize possible discomfort to sensitive individuals we are requesting no pets.
neighborhood_overview:
This is one of the historic neighborhoods of Monterey, known as "New Monterey." Cannery workers lived up on this hill. When the boat loads of sardines arrived, the canneries would blow a whistle and the workers would go down to the factories.

The neighborhood is full of creative people and it's reflected in the diversity of interesting shops and restaurants on Lighthouse Avenue in Monterey, and in the area surrounding Cannery Row. There are many fancy and less fancy restaurants, a few bars, a Goodwill thrift store, funky little clothing consignment shops, vape shops, tattoo parlors and massage places. It is awesome and authentic, as is Safeway, Ace Hardware, Rite Aid, Starbucks, Downtown Pacific Grove, The Motorcycle Museum, PG Art Center, Natural History Museum, Lovers Point, the beaches, Aquarium, wharves, etc.
host_about:
I was born and raised in Monterey. I've driven a taxi here off and on for many years, and have really enjoyed getting to know the community from this perspective. Monterey Peninsula is a very interesting and diverse place with a lot of great people.

I like to read, go to movies, and walk on the beach with Wendy. I like meeting the people who visit Monterey, and I like to travel too. I like reading about current events, science and history. Wendy likes social media, shopping and thrift stores.

name: Rustic Pacific Grove Cottage By The Sea (Lic 0443)
description:
My house is a charming, cottage style home in Pacific Grove. My house is very private and sits far back from the street. We are located approx. 1.5 miles to the beach. Pebble beach is less than half mile. Our house is roughly 1,200 sq ft with 3 bedrooms. Smaller cottage style kitchen. We allow 2 adults and 2 children Please respect my home as if it was your own.

Please read the ENTIRE description below including all the drop down menus before you request booking.

The space
Let me start out by saying you are able to use the entire property in privacy and I will not bother you.

Our property has countless cozy little nooks for you to relax and enjoy your vacation. We have a fully operational jacuzzi enclosed in our private, lush front yard. Our living room sports a wood burning fireplace and flat screen TV with Netflix available (of course!). Our kitchen has all stainless steel appliances and a sit down bar. The kitchen is also stocked with
neighborhood_overview:
Our property location is centrally located in the Southern point of the Monterey Bay Peninsula. We are close to everything. Our house is located approx. one and a half miles from the beach, less than half mile to Pebble Beach Country Club Gate. A 5 minute car ride to the Aquarium and Cannery Row, 8 minutes away from Carmel, and only 25 minutes from gorgeous Big Sur as seen on HBO's "Big Little Lies”

Pacific Grove is an incredibly unique town. We are called "The Last Home Town of America" for a reason. Our neighborhood is like a forest in fact it used to be part of the forest. With hills, trees, raccoons, squirrels, and the sound of seagulls and the sound of the Pacific Ocean. The forest is only one block you will be in pebble beach. You can hike or ride your bicycle on the beautiful trails. Our town is known for its natural beauty and unforgettable coast line. We are a short drive to shops, golf courses, spas, restaurants, downtown, nightlife, and much more.
host_about: Hi I am Toni.  Nice to meet you. I am a very easy going helpful person.  I love people, pets and nature!  You will enjoy my beach cottage located in Pacific Grove Ca located on the Monterey Bay Peninsula.  This is truly paradise!

host_about: Local artist who also works as an occupational therapist specializing in pain management.  I have not owned a car since 2009, and sail/kayak in the Monterey Bay if I'm not on one of my amazing bikes.  I live just up the street in a 110 year old Victorian where my children grew up into better adults than I am, both of whom are Junior Olympians in volleyball. - Carriage House: Carriage house with queen + full bathroom

The space
THE AREA
10 minutes to everything: Walk to the Monterey Bay Aquarium, to Lovers Point beach, to downtown Pacific Grove, to Cannery Row for amusements, shopping and great dining. Drive to the 17 Mile Drive, Pebble Beach and Carmel. Day trip to wine tasting, Big Sur and California's famous Highway 1.

This unique home is perfectly suited for two couples or a family that wants privacy but also to be in a cozy spot together. Meet in the main cottage k
neighborhood_overview: The Retreat area of Pacific Grove is a community of quaint cottages that are steps from the ocean, steps to the Monterey Bay Aquarium and minutes away by car from Pebble Beach, the world famous Concours d'Elegance, a US Open golf course, Carmel by the Sea, the 17-Mile Drive and just a half-hour drive to Big Sur.
host_about:
I lead social media for a global insurance company and my husband Sal heads up software architecture for a finance company. We have two kiddos and a dog. 

I really like being involved with AirBnB and have participated in several conferences and projects with them, because they do a good job of looping in hosts from the Bay Area.

We are grateful for our family homes on Monterey Bay and in Lake Tahoe and enjoy sharing them with other families. We would also love to share our Sausalito home, one day.

I'm always happy to offer tips on restaurants and things to do in at any one of our places.

I tweet and Insta post from the handle @tripmogul, sharing what's new and exciting on the Truckee, LakeTahoe, PacificGrove, Monterey and Sausalito hashtags. We love connecting with our guests, helping them with their plans and then hearing how their stays were. 

Looking forward to sharing our place with you!

name: The Matcha House (monthly)
description:
Simple, small (940 sq. ft.), smoke-free, clean & cozy 3 beds house located outside of Pebble Beach. The kitchen is small, but functional. Great value for this area: easy access to DTPacific Grove/Pebble Beach/Hwy 1/Carmel/Monterey/Big Sur. Enjoy a Cal-King Tempurpedic, Japanese style soaking tub and YAMAHA upright piano. 1 dog (<20 lbs) is permissible by request.

Dog fee $200/month.

*Guests that bring a dog w/t prior approval will be charged $50/night.

The space
**After June 1, 2020, we are renting monthly.

** Holidays & Special Events may have higher rates.

Come to the Matcha House during your next trip to the Monterey Peninsula!

We call it the Matcha House because we love Matcha and our house wall is Matcha green:)

Located a minute outside of Pebble Beach (Country Club Gate) and easy access to Highway 1/Carmel, this simple getaway provides all basic amenities and is situated in a quiet resi
neighborhood_overview: It's not in downtown so it's very quiet, but easy to get to local town centers(downtown Pacific Grove about 7 minutes, downtown Monterey & Carmel about 13 minutes). Only a minute away from Pebble Beach Country Club Gate, Del Monte Forest, and 5 minutes to HW-1. This neighborhood is very quiet and close to all the popular attractions the Monterey Peninsula has to offer. Also: Trader Joe's, Rite-Aid, Safeway, Savemart, etc. all within 3 minutes.
host_about: My wife and I have lived on the Monterey Peninsula since 2002 and are in love with this place! I (Eddie) was born and raised in Monterey, while Miko is from Yokohama, Japan. We are both pianists (jazz and classical) and teach/perform in Monterey and the Bay Area. We also have one daughter who's currently living in NYC and a Shiba Inu (dog). Airbnb is an exciting learning experience; we get to meet all kinds of wonderful people from all over! Being here on the Monterey Peninsula brings us close to nature and allows us to live comfortably with an artistic mindset. Our bungalow in the forest is quiet, but centrally located: 1 minute to Pebble Beach, 7 minutes to the aquarium, 5 minutes to HW1 at Carmel hill. We hope you can enjoy this feeling while staying on the Peninsula as we do!

neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a very quiet seaside town with excellent restaurants within walking distance from Seven Gables, a biking and hiking trail running for miles along the oceanfront and spectacular natural scenery.  Pacific Grove and Monterey are right next to each other.  Carmel is just a short 5 mile drive away.
host_about:
The Seven Gables Inn is personally managed by our family. 

Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982 and since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Innkeeping. 

For all reservation questions please feel free to send us a message as we will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total 25 individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom and many with private outside entrances that only you would use. 

Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. 

Each room has a Keurig beverage maker.

Greeting you upon arrival is a complimentary Wine Welcome package with a nice bottle of wine/sparkling cider and fun snacks.

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, Susan Flatley Wheelwright, Ed Flatley and JR Wheelwright

name: Romantic Private  Master Suite & Gardens #0427
description:
Escape to this master suite with a private entrance. Experience breathtaking views of the world famous Monterey Bay. Listen to the waves and watch sea life play from your adjustable King bed. Unwind with a glass of wine or fresh morning coffee in a pair of comfy chairs or at the dining table for two.
A private stone patio will entice you outside.

Private entrance, Mini fridge, microwave, coffee pot, 40’ TV, washer & dryer, private stone patio, BBQ & dining table. Quiet neighborhood!

The space
Listed as a private room, but it is so much more.

A private entrance and set of stairs takes you directly to your Ocean View Suite. You will also have sole access to a beautifully manicured stone patio and garden.

The suite is set up for you to enjoy a restful night's sleep, an ocean view with your coffee and a dining table perfect for two.

Guest access
Guests will have their own private entrance.
neighborhood_overview:
Our neighborhood is very quiet both day and night. Easy access to a walking trail along the coast will lead you into Monterey and the Monterey Bay Aquarium.

We are 3/4 miles from Lovers Point beach with fine dining and casual food.

We are 1 mile from downtown Pacific Grove, a very quaint little town with a variety of fine restaurants .
host_about: We love to hike, walk along the water, wine & dine, and have friends to our home.  We have been running a bed and breakfast for our friends every since we moved to Pacific Grove, just not for profit! Ha ha.  People love to come to our area and our home, and we love it too!  We have traveled all over Europe several times and love Southern Germany & the Alps.  Especially hiking there, the people and the friendliness.  We do say thought that the hardest thing about living where we do is "Where do you go for vacation?"  We just like it here so much. We are California natives so can tell you much about all of Cali.  I love to plan itinneraries for our friends and guest especially day trips to Big Sur.

name: Quaint Pacific Grove/Pebble Beach
description:
Sanitized master queen bedroom/bath AND at request, twin bedroom/private separate bath in quaint Pacific Grove. *Second rm would be available for additional fee of $25 per person including children after 2 which must be Family.Walk to Pacific Grove, Cannery Row, Monterey Bay or drive to Carmel or Big Sur which is only 30 mi. New smart TV in master bedroom. No TV in twin. Portable bed for twin or master. License #0306. Please drive slowly in cul de sac!!

The space
Our home is on a small, quiet street. The bedroom you will be staying in is on the second floor; a master Bedroom/bathroom and a bedroom with two twin beds and a bath across the hall. Both available if you are a family. There is a $25 fee for each additional person, including children. Each bedroom has three windows, and is light and airy with hardwood floors and travertine tiles in the bath. The master bath is large, has two sinks with a bath tub, and shower. Lots of mirrors makes it great if yo
neighborhood_overview: We live on a lovely cul-de-sac street in Pacific Grove which is quiet and cozy.  Please drive slowly on the cul de sac!One block away is the the bus stop.  Two blocks away is Forest Ave. (highway 68) which, if you turn left will take you straight to Ocean Ave. and the beaches. Turn right and you can walk or drive the trail to Cannery Row, Fisherman's Warf and Monterey.  Turn right and it will take you to Asilomar, Pebble Beach, Carmel and eventually Big Sur.  Please park in our driveway.  Please drive slowly in the cul de sac!!!
host_about: My husband and I are retired educators.  We are quiet people renting a Master Bedroom and Bathroom in the second floor of our home.  There is no kitchen as our kitchen is under construction.   Pacific Grove is beautiful and there are great restaurants in town or in Cannery Row.  We are close to the Monterey Bay, and the Aquarium voted the best in the country.  Additionally next to the Aquarium is historic Steinbeck's Cannery Row.  Pacific Grove offers fine restaurants and a quaint downtown, all within walking distance.  We also live less than a mile from Pebble Beach, Spanish Bay's AT&T's Golf Tournament and only 30 miles from Big Sur, one of the most scenic drives is the world.  Visit Monterey and shop Carmel if you have time!  Time Zone  America/San Francisco  WI FI

We offer free two(2) Aquarium passes.

name: Cottage Retreat Steps from the Sea
description:
This sweet, vintage cottage is close to the beach, restaurants and dining, great views, and family-friendly activities. You will love the beautiful light, comfy furnishings, great outdoors space, and quaint and quiet neighborhood. Unfortunately, we can not accept pets.

Pacific Grove License # 0295

The space
Only a short 1/2 block to the sea at Berwick Park and the famed bike path along the Monterey Bay sanctuary. Step out your front door to view the Bay; a short walk to the famous Monterey Bay Aquarium and to downtown Pacific Grove. Two bedrooms and one bathroom with shower/tub. Stocked kitchen with many amenities.

Guest access
You "own" the whole home.
neighborhood_overview: Feel the calming sea breeze in a quiet serene neighborhood.  A quick walk to activities, shopping, restaurants and night life.
host_about: We are Jim and Viveca and we look forward to hosting you at our Cottage Retreat, just steps to the sea!  We have lived in Pacific Grove for over 30 years, and love the friendliness and beauty of our community.  Joy manages our property and lives two minutes away from the house.  She rides bikes, I ride horses and Jim rides waves. Together, we will do our best to make sure your stay at our cottage by the sea is perfect!

name: Guest House 5 minutes to Asilomar and Pebble Beach
description:
Lic #0335. Located 3 blocks from the beach and 2 blocks from Asilomar State Park, we are 1 mile from historic downtown Pacific Grove. Amenities include a quiet forested neighborhood, a peek of ocean from the bedroom and a spacious 800 sq. ft. of living area. The living room features high ceilings, a fireplace and paintings by local artists. Our 1/2 acre wooded lot includes fruit trees and a vegetable garden. Note: Access requires 3 steps down from the driveway and 3 steps up to the entry.

The space
Centrally located for the pleasures of the Monterey Peninsula, we are five blocks from the entrance to Pebble Beach, and ten minutes drive to the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row. Carmel and Monterey's Fisherman's Wharf are both close by, and Big Sur is a breathtaking one hour drive down the coast.

Guest access
Your area includes a large living room with a gas fireplace and cable TV with "on demand" movies; a fully equipped kitchen (inc
neighborhood_overview: Our neighborhood is located in a pine and oak forest.  Between us and the shoreline (about a block away) is a row of sand dunes that shelters our garden from the winds off the ocean.  The neighborhood is very quiet and peaceful, with very little traffic..  Asilomar State Park and Conference Grounds (and the Asilomar beach) is just around the corner, and the historic Point Pinos Lighthouse (built in 1855) is also an easy 15 minute walk away. The Monarch Butterfly Sanctuary, which give Pacific Grove its title of "Butterfly Town USA" is right in our neighborhood and just a ten minute stroll from our place.

name: Dolphin House *30 day minimum stay* great location
description:
Dolphin House is a quaint, light-filled beach house with a 30 day minimum stay. It is centrally located in a quiet neighborhood a short walk from Downtown Pacific Grove, Monterey Bay Aquarium, restaurants, the coastal recreation trail and beaches. A binder in the kitchen provides information. It provides a great home base for visiting wineries in Carmel Valley, Point Lobos, Carmel, Monterey, Moss Landing, and Salinas.
The house consists of two bedrooms and one bath.

The space
The living room has a gas fireplace which contributes to a cozy space for relaxing and visiting with friends and family after a busy day exploring the area. WIFI and cable TV is available. Enjoy the many restaurants, cook at home in the well equipped kitchen, or use the gas Weber Grill in the backyard ( a patio table and six chairs is provided). Shop at the local, Grove Market or Andronico’s Safeway, Lucky or Trader Joe's, all less than a mile away.
Children are welcome gue
neighborhood_overview: The house is a half mile walk from the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row shops and restaurants. Less than half a mile in the other direction is downtown Pacific Grove with more shops and restaurants.  A binder in the kitchen shows some of your options. Thousands of Monarch Butterflies overwinter (October to March)  in Pacific Grove. You can visit the Butterfly  Sanctuary where they cluster in the trees to conserve heat when the temperature is lower than 55 degrees F.  When they sunlight warms them, they fly off to gather nectar.  You can often see them hanging in the trees or flying about.  Monterey Bay is visible from the house and less than half a mile away.  Beaches (Lovers Point for family beach  play is great), bike and walking/running trails await.  Drive a short way down Highway 1 to Point Lobos for hiking and viewing ocean cliffs or to Carmel Valley for wine tasting.  Take a whale watching cruise in Moss Landing ( Sanctuary Cruises) or try clam chowder sample tasting from M
host_about: My husband and I spent our honeymoon in the Monterey Bay Area in 1969 and fell in love with it.  In 2015 we found this lovely house.  We hope you enjoy the area and our home as much as we do!

Close to Asilomar, Monterey Bay Aquarium and Pebble Beach a relaxing space to unwind after your visit to Carmel or hike in Big Sur.

We are Covid aware and have taken the extra steps to protect you and us. We welcome any questions you have.

The space
Feel like you are in a treehouse in this second story, studio space and have a peek of the bay. Just a mile from the entrance to Pebble Beach and a few blocks from the beach.

Your adventure begins with a spiral staircase that takes you to the landing of your treehouse studio space.

Greeted by a queen bed, we also have a table and chairs for you to work or relax.

A cozy couch is perfect for reading and relaxing and a full air mattress can be provided upon request for the kids
neighborhood_overview: Centrally located to experience Pebble Beach, Monterey and Carmel.  A drive around the bay takes you to Santa Cruz and a short drive south leads to Big Sur. The studio has a "peak" of the ocean and you can definitely hear the ocean on most nights. Asilomar is less than a mile away as is the recreation trail to walk, job or ride your bike. On Mondays PG hosts a farmer's market in the evening. Our studio is located in a neighborhood and there is ample street parking.
host_about:
I’ve traveled to 11 countries and 14 states, and that’s just since I was married! I love to travel and want you to feel safe and comfortable. The Treehouse space is active with birds and squirrels and butterflies when in season. You will often see deer as well and that just out your window.

The Monterey Peninsula is my second favorite discovery spot (Galapagos is my first) and we will share tips with you to get the most out of your visit.

With Covid-19 it can be a scary time and we have put protocols in place that protect us and you.

Cheers! To getaways and discovery.

My place is close to Carmel and Monterey, some of the best dining, family-friendly activities, Fisherman's Wharf, Pebble Beach, The 17-mile Drive, Monterey Bay Aquarium, Lover's Point Beach, Downtown Pacific Grove, Downtown Monterey, and Asilomar Beach. Point Lobos is about 10 mins and Big Sur is only 45 mins away!

The space
This is really an entire place to yourself! VERY CLEAN, large spacious bedroom with queen bed, optional roll-a-way fold-out bed that you can set up, optional sleepmat for floor you may set up. Guest access

neighborhood_overview: We live in a very safe and peaceful neighborhood.  Pacific Grove has an extremely low crime rate. One of the safest places in America! Very family-friendly. It is a residential area, but minutes from all the fun stuff! One mile from the BEACH!  We are only a couple of blocks from Pebble Beach.  Also, there is a beautiful forest a couple of blocks away to take a tranquil walk.
host_about: We are both veterans and have been married for 18 years now.  Josh has been running a moving business for 15 years and Angi is a stay-at-home mother.  We both love Thai, Japanese, and Mexican food!  Together we host a private room in Pacific Grove, California and love meeting new people and helping enrich their time traveling here.

name: Central to Everything - Casa Mariposa
description:
Casa Mariposa is centrally located in the sunniest part of Pacific Grove, on a quiet street within walking distance of the Ocean, Cannery Row, Lovers Point, Asilomar Beach, Spanish Bay, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and much more. We are near Washington Park and the Monarch butterfly sanctuary. Sorry - no pets, no smoking, and no loud parties. *IMPORTANT NOTE: We no longer rent our home for less than 30 days.

The space
Our home boasts many green attributes: It has a state-of-the-art solar system installed on the roof which powers all of the home electrical needs. It also has a sophisticated rain-water catchment system which allows us to conserve drinking water by using rainwater for the gardens. South-facing windows capture the sun and we have energy efficient lighting throughout.

We live in a nice quiet neighborhood central to everything on the Peninsula. Two formal bedrooms (one queen and one king bed) plus a queen size sleep sofa and
neighborhood_overview: Casa Mariposa is centrally located in a quiet sunny neighborhood of Pacific Grove.  We are within walking distance of the Ocean, Cannery Row, Lovers Point, Asilomar Beach, Spanish Bay, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and much more.  Also near Washington Park and the Monarch butterfly sanctuary.
host_about: Casa Mariposa is the home of Julie Martinez and Jon Kramer, globe-trotting adventurers with natural history backgrounds and a passion for Earth and all its incredible worlds and cultures.  Julie is a natural history illustrator and art instructor.  Jon is a geological engineer and solar energy developer.  Together they author adventure guidebooks.  You will see some of Julie’s art on these walls and their joint adventure guidebooks on the shelves.  Many fossils and rocks from their various geologic adventures are displayed throughout the property.

name: Asilomar Ocean Retreat
description:
Our spacious retreat, on a private half-acre, is a short walk to Asilomar beach. The great room has soaring ceilings, a spacious dining area, a kitchen bar and couches looking onto the gardens. The cozy living room has a wood-burning fireplace. The game room has a foosball table and brochures about area attractions. The lounging spaces and chef’s kitchen will tempt you to hibernate, but our guide also tells about the best walks and restaurants, and fun things to do.
Our license number is 0034

The space
The great room provides a central gathering space for cooking, eating and lounging. The living room provides a more intimate space for watching T.V. or for gathering around the fire. The four bedrooms, with French doors onto the gardens, provide private spaces. The kids can enjoy playing foosball in the game room, shooting hoops in the driveway or exploring the wooded back yard. Dogs are welcome, with prior notice. (There is a $50 pet fee. )
Our retreat
neighborhood_overview: Walk a few blocks to the Asilomar State Park and beach entrance. From there, you may stroll the beach and miles of coastal paths. Asilomar Beach is perfect for tide-pooling and is also the only beach in the area that welcomes dogs. We are walking distance to the beginning of 17-mile drive, one of the most scenic drives in the world and to the Monarch Sanctuary, where thousands of monarch butterflies winter after their migration from Canada.  Downtown Pacific Grove, with its quaint shops and excellent restaurants, is a 6-minute car ride away.   Nearby Lovers Point offers a protected sandy beach, great for kids, swimming, and snorkeling. Directions to all these places are in our guide, which we mail to you before you come. Downtown Carmel is only 15 minutes away. If you want to venture further afield, Big Sur is an hour's drive along the stunning coast road.

neighborhood_overview: City Hall town clock is a block away -- the clock chimes every fifteen minutes during the day and during winter holidays, plays holiday music.  We find it charming.
host_about: Local artist who also works as an occupational therapist specializing in pain management.  I have not owned a car since 2009, and sail/kayak in the Monterey Bay if I'm not on one of my amazing bikes.  I live just up the street in a 110 year old Victorian where my children grew up into better adults than I am, both of whom are Junior Olympians in volleyball.  Sometimes I love sitting in the Art House or The LIttle Blue House more than my own -- peaceful and serene doesn't do it justice....

name: Long term/month to month Cottage In Pacific Grove
description:
30 day rental, minimum. Lovely studio cottage in Pacific Grove, walking distance to Asilomar Beach, downtown PG, nearby grocery and outdoor activities. The renovated cottage has wi-fi, kitchen, cable, luxury linens, fully furnished for a relaxing stay.

Minutes to NPS, DLI, Pebble Beach, Carmel, and Monterey. Rates negotiable for more than one month stay.
host_about: My husband and I love life and enjoy sharing it with others.  I love to cook and drink good wine.  Being a good host is all about making others feel comfortable.  I'm a Southerner at my roots, so ya'll come and visit--I might have a nice glass of iced tea waiting for you!

name: Mermaid Beach House, Walk to Beach / Aquarium!
description:
Relax and unwind at our beach getaway that's within walking distance to Lovers Point beach, Downtown Pacific Grove, Cannery Row, and Fisherman's Wharf. Just a few steps out the front door is a glorious 7-mile walking/bike trail that meanders from the Monterey Bay Aquarium around the point to the expansive Asilomar Beach, a favorite spot for walking in the soft sand and enjoying gorgeous sunsets. This house can accommodate up to 6 adults and 2 children under the age of 12.

PG License #0171

The space
This charming 3 bedroom, 3 bathroom home features a reverse floor plan with a downstairs living suite, bedroom, bathroom, and private patio. The upstairs includes a living room, a fully equipped kitchen, dining table for six, balcony patio with barbecue, ocean view, queen bedroom with full bath, and master suite with Jacuzzi tub and King bed. 0.1 Mile from Lovers Point Park (right across the street!). Walk across the street to the beach for some fun with the
neighborhood_overview: Grab your towel and beach chair, you will be within walking distance to the beautiful Lovers Point Beach!
host_about: Tommy is a Creative Director and Mallary is a Denim Designer living in beautiful Modjeska Canyon, CA, with a 1 year old named Hank! We are very easy going hosts and guest experience is our #1 priority. We're very hands off but always available if you need us. We look forward to having you as our guest!

name: Outback Bungalow
description:
City of Pacific Grove Short-Term Rental License #0352

Our Outback Bungalow is the perfect place for a couple getaway. Close to the beach and walking distance to downtown Pacific Grove, and the Aquarium.

Guest access
Entire house, and yard

Other things to note
The bungalow is equipped with kitchenware, Pots, Pans, cooking utensils, silverware, plates, bowls, cups and coffer maker. Fresh bed linens, and towels are provided for guests as well. We are no longer providing spices, oils, or any food related items due to the Covid situation, for cleaning an sanatation. We are also no longer providing a hair dryer, shampoo, condition and body wash in the shower, to eliminate the use of shared products. due to the Covid Situation.
host_about: Currently pursuing a career in Real Estate. Avid cyclist who loves animals the beach, and the great out doors!

name: 3743 Nightly Rental ~ Walk to the Aquarium, the Beach & Downtown
description:
King in upstairs master suite with en suite bathroom, queen in downstairs bedroom with adjacent bath;2 bedroom, 2 bathroom home 1 block from the ocean.
Upstairs master suite has a king bed, an en suite bathroom and a peek of the bay over rooftops.

Welcome to Pelican Peaks! Sleeps 4 adults

With beautiful ocean views and the beach just steps from the front door, this Pacific Grove home is truly a bay lover’s dream come true.

The space
The 2-bedroom, 2-bath cottage is a few minutes'’ walk from the Monterey Bay Recreation Trail and Andy Jacobson Park, and is within easy walking distance of the Monterey Bay Aquarium and Cannery Row as well as a variety of restaurants on Pacific Grove’s Central Avenue. Downtown Pacific Grove is just a 5-minute car ride away, and 15 minutes' to either charming Carmel-by-the-Sea or golfing and dining in Pebble Beach®.

host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

description:
This unit is a monthly rental. You must arrive by the second of the month, and depart within the same month. 2100 sf, 3 bedroom, 3 bath vacation home sleeps 6-8 (Q, K or 2 Tw, K + Q futon couch sleeps 1-2 children.)

Welcome to “Seashore Retreat”! Sleeps up to 6 adults & 2 children age 12 and under.

This charming home is just two blocks from the beach and has décor that includes lighthouses, ships and the history of the Monterey Bay.

The space
With two bedrooms on the ground floor and a master bedroom suite on the second floor, Seashore Retreat is perfect for a family or for couples traveling together.

Located on a quiet one-way street within walking distance of downtown Pacific Grove’s restaurants, shops and movie theater, the 3-bedroom, 3-bath house is also just a 5-minute drive to the Monterey Bay Aquarium and historic Cannery Row, about 8 minutes' to downtown Monterey, and 15 to 20 minutes' by car to Carmel and Pebble Beach®.

description:
2356 sf, 4 bedroom, 2 bath vacation home sleeps 8. (3K,1 Q)

Welcome to “Captain’s Castle”! Sleeps up to 8 adults.

This historic home built in 1883, sits just steps from Monterey Bay and a walking/bicycling trail that meanders for 15 miles along the coastline. You're less than a 10 minute walk along this trail to Cannery Row and the aquarium.

The exterior of this whimsical 2356 square feet, 4-bedroom, 2-bath home, called “Captain's Castle,” comes complete with gargoyles, gables and ...

...stained glass windows. The predominant feature is a square tower that offers a bird's-eye view of all the comings and goings on the bay.

description:
30 Day Minimum due to local restrictions. Amazing views of Monterey Bay, quiet and private one bedroom upstairs apartment with full kitchen and bathroom with a shower, toilet and sink. ABSOLUTELY NO ANIMALS DUE TO ALLERGIES OF FAMILY MEMBER.

The space
Guests are only allowed to use the upstairs unit.

Guest access
The entire apartment is private and is yours to enjoy during your stay.

Other things to note
Block away from the ocean and in a very lovely neighborhood.
garbage is picked up on Tuesday mornings. Cans are in the driveway. Please make sure trash can has bunny cord securing the lid, we have raccoons in Pacific Grove.
Your gate needs to be locked at all times, when you enter and when you leave. Bikes and other things have been stolen if gate is not locked.
neighborhood_overview: Block away from Oceanside bike path, 10 minute walk to downtown Pacific Grove with shops, restaurants and more. 10 minute walk to Lover's Point Beach. If you notice any issues please do not hesitate to text me.  If you notice leaks, drips or other issues that need to be brought to my attention, please do not delay, I will promptly attend to all issues.
host_about: Active lifestyle, to bed early, up early, trying to garden, bake and keep the house.

name: Explore Monterey Marine Life from a Pacific Grove House
description:
Step through a pair of French doors and enjoy cocktails on a roof terrace with a view of a leafy neighborhood. Stay warm by a living room fireplace, then retire to a spacious Scandinavian style bedroom with a vaulted ceiling and exposed beams.

Our home is just a few blocks from the beach at Lover's Point and less than five minutes away by car from the Monterey Bay Aquarium, Cannery Row, Asilomar State Beach, 17 Mile Drive, Point Pinos Lighthouse, Pebble Beach, and a variety of family activities. Per Pacific Grove ordinance, this property is only available for stays of 30 days or more.
neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove has dozens of great restaurants, coffee shops, and wine bars—most within a short walk of the house. Lover's Point Beach is a few blocks away, for renting kayaks and paddling with the harbor seals and sea otters.  Once you arrive, you may not get back in your car again. The recreation trail on the coast is just a few blocks away and will take you to all of the sites. Pacific Grove is a great walking and biking town.  Three bicycles are available for your use.

name: "Pacific Jewel" Close to Ocean, Golf, Spas Restaurants & Shops
description:
This newly remodeled and updated home is only a ten-minute walk to the Pacific Ocean or downtown Pacific Grove’s shops and restaurants. Monterey’s Aquarium and Cannery Row are mere minutes away, while Golfers will find Pebble Beach’s world-class courses within a 15 minutes drive.

This 3 bedroom 3 bath newly remodeled 1700 square foot single level home with a bonus/game room that has a Queen sofa sleeper with a 4" memory foam topper is only 0.8 miles from the Pacific. This unique design features a 2 bed 2 bath front unit. A newly remodeled, detached Master Suite provides offers its inhabitants privacy and seclusion, ocean views, a King bed and large full bathroom.

The home plan features hardwood floors and lots of natural light through the many floor to ceiling windows presenting views of the Monterey Bay. A spacious great room with gas fireplace is perfect for family gatherings and entertaining guests.

Anything your family chef might require
neighborhood_overview:
The Monterey Peninsula is different than any other part of California. Here, time slows, the architecture is humble (with the exception of the homes in Pebble Beach), and the lifestyle is the perfect synthesis of SoCal laid back and NorCal sophisticated. On the northern side of the peninsula, the town of Monterey draws most of the tourists, while farther south, Carmel-by-the-Sea lures the easygoing wealthy set. Tremendous price tags on real estate helps maintain the small-community atmosphere along Monterey's jaw-dropping coastline.

This area makes for a tremendous road-trip stop or romantic weekend stay. And did we mention the golf courses? This stretch of the California coastline boasts some of the most coveted fairways in the world. Add to than an abundance of natural wonders, luxury resorts and seafood restaurants, and Monterey might just be the ideal destination for your next getaway.
host_about:
Our CEO, MaryJane was an executive with the Hyatt for seven years. She chose to leave the work force and stayed home to raise three boys! MaryJane fell into a job I loved, managing a Vacation Rental Company on the Monterey Peninsula and fell in LOVE with the idea of renting homes instead of Hotels. She left the company and started her own business to continue her passion for meeting people near and far and sharing the love of travel.

AirBnb had software problems, and had to recreate several of our listings,  under a second account.

You may see MaryJane's 149 Guest Reviews from the original Host Account.

description:

One Bedroom, bathroom, kitchen, dining room, living room, and 2 balconies. Partial Ocean view. Located above Petra Restaurant. Very short walk to the ocean. Centrally located.

-All guests receive a 20% discount at Petra Mediterranean Restaurant, located downstairs below the suite, for the duration of their stay. Maximum 3 guests. Petra is open Monday thru Saturday 11:00-7:00 (closed on Sunday).
neighborhood_overview: Welcome to America’s last hometown. Downtown Pacific Grove 2 blocks from Ocean. Walk to ocean, restaurants, movie theater, Lover’s Point, and downtown. neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a very quiet seaside town with excellent restaurants within walking distance from Seven Gables, a biking and hiking trail running for miles along the oceanfront and spectacular natural scenery. host_about:
The Seven Gables Inn is personally managed by our family. 

Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982 and since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Innkeeping. 

For all reservation questions please feel free to send us a message as we will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total 25 individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom and many with private outside entrances that only you would use. 

Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. 

Each room has a Keurig beverage maker.

Greeting you upon arrival is a complimentary Wine Welcome package with a nice bottle of wine/sparkling cider and fun snacks.

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, Susan Flatley Wheelwright, Ed Flatley and JR Wheelwright

name: 3730 Anchors Away ~ Spectacular Oceanfront Location, Steps from Bay and Trail
description:
This unit is a monthly rental. You must arrive by the second of the month, and depart within the same month. 1600sf, 4 Bedroom, 2.5 Bath home directly across from Monterey Bay and Bay Recreation Trail.
Home sleeps up to 9 Guests.
Master: King Bed, Guest Room #2: King Bed, Guest Room #3: Queen Bed, #4 Bunk Bed (Queen & Twin)
Enjoy front row seat ocean views.

Welcome to Anchors Away! Sleeps up to 8 adults & 1 child.

The space
Incredible sweeping views of the Monterey Bay can be seen from this nautically themed home located just steps away from the beach, the Monterey Peninsula Recreation Trail and Pacific Grove Marine Gardens Park.

The 1,800-square-foot home on Pacific Grove’s famous Ocean View Boulevard has a distinct sense of history, with an 1880s anchor recovered from the bay as an accent in the front yard, artwork of ships and the bay, historic maps and other intriguing items throughout.

Views of the bay can be
neighborhood_overview:
Please download our App to obtain our local recommendations and area attractions. Access to the App is automatically provided via email after your reservation is paid in full. You can share this app with all the guests in your party.
Please note that our Good Neighbor Policy is posted in our home and is strictly enforced.
host_about:
Sanctuary Vacation Rentals represents properties throughout Carmel, Pebble Beach, Pacific Grove, Carmel Highlands, and the Big Sur coastline. We combine fine resort accommodations and relaxed elegance with all the comforts of home. 
Our properties are places that nurture and inspire and are located in one of the most beautiful, energizing places in the world, featuring the spectacular scenery of the Monterey Peninsula and the central coast of California.  From historic old Monterey, to the Victorian charm of Pacific Grove, and the artists colony of Carmel-by-the-Sea, and the breathtaking scenery of Big Sur, generations of people have been rejuvenated by the breaking waves and sandy beaches here.
Our properties are designer furnished with relaxed elegance.  Many homes feature the colors of the sea and take inspiration from the natural beauty of the surrounding areas.
Throughout Sanctuary’s vacation rentals, you’ll find comfortable beds with luxury linens, welcome beverages and hors d’oeuvres, spa robes and amenities, local wine tasting and spa passes, and a personal concierge to assist you in every way.  Our homes feature chef’s dream kitchens and everything you’ll need to entertain in style.  And many of our properties are pet friendly.
If you’re looking for a refreshing, relaxed stay in one of the most beautiful areas in the world– offering all the comforts of home, let Sanctuary Vacation Rentals help you discover your own sanctuary by the sea.  

The Monterey Peninsula is unique in its combination of breathtaking natural resources and a multiplicity of cultural and entertainment possibilities. You can find something for every possible taste. For nature lovers, there is the diversity of mountain and sea, for picnicking, surfing, fishing, horseback riding, hiking, beach-combing, bird-watching, kayaking, scuba diving, tide-pooling, biking and more. If you want a man-made excitement, we have art galleries galore, excellent fine-art museums, local theatre, outstanding restaurants, boutiques, a natural history and a children's museum, a world-class aquarium, and that's just for starters. History buffs will have a field day exploring the adobes of Monterey. There's so much to do that you cannot possibly do it all in one visit, which means you will have to come back.

name: 3759 Pacific Grove Retreat ~ Walk to Aquarium, Cannery Row and Downtown!
description:
This unit is a monthly rental. You must arrive by the second of the month, and depart within the same month. 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom home with lower level apartment attached; small well-behaved pets (pristine wood floors) 1 small garage for storage; K/Tw in Master, Queen, Twin

Welcome to Pacific Grove Retreat! Sleeps 5

Vintage charm and local history combine in this mid-century home, with ocean views from most windows, and just steps away from the beach and downtown Pacific Grove.

The space
The 3-bedroom, 1-bath home is close to everything and yet has a sense of privacy, surrounded by fencing and landscaping that hides the home from view. Built in 1948, the residence was originally the parsonage for the Lutheran Church of Monterey, and has had only one other owner since.

The 1,400-square-foot house is just a 5-minute walk to shops and restaurants in downtown Pacific Grove, or to the beach and the Monterey Bay Recreational Trail. It’

name: Mermaid Crossing
description:
Mermaid Crossing offers two houses for the price of one! The main house offers two bedrooms, and the detached master suite offers a king size bed that may be split into two twins upon request. Ocean views from every room! Serene and private setting.

The space
Mermaid Crossing offers two houses for the price of one! The main house offers two bedrooms with queen size beds in each room, and the detached master suite offers a king size bed that may be split into two twins upon request. Ocean views from every room! Serene and private setting. Flexible living arrangements with 2/1.5 house & 1/1 cottage. Gourmet Kitchen. Big Patio, BBQ & Firepit.
 “Mermaid Crossing” is the perfect location to experience all that Monterey, California has to offer.  Mermaid Crossing was a labor of love, as the owners painstakingly updated and restored this 100 year-old historic beach cottage to be enjoyed for generations to come. Keep your eye out for otters basking out on the bay f
neighborhood_overview:
“Mermaid Crossing” is located on Mermaid Ave. the premier destination for those who want easy (walking or biking) access to all the conveniences and attractions but would rather enjoy the quiet serenity this zone provides. At Mermaid Crossing, you can park the car and forget about it. Walk out the front door and take 70 steps until your toes touch the water at famous Lover’s Point, a calm swimming beach during the summer that boasts great surfing during the winter months. Take in the jaw-dropping views of the entire Monterey Bay as you stroll along the Monterey Recreation trail to the front doors of the world renowned Monterey Bay Aquarium.
Great dining options abound the closest being the historic Beach House at Lover’s Point which has a full bar (open late) and gourmet seafood. Bringing your clubs? The Pacific Grove Municipal Golf Links is quite literally, in your backyard. Enjoy it’s stellar reputation as one of the “Nation’s Top 50 Gold Courses under $50.00” by Golf Digest.
host_about:
Rhonda is the managing broker of Pacific Grove Property Management. Their goal is to make your stay with them pleasurable enough to leave you longing to come back! They love where they live and can't wait to share it with you!  
CADRE# (Phone number hidden by Airbnb)

name: Forest Home on 1/4  Acre
description:
Cozy and spacious 1 bedroom, 1 bath cottage, w/bonus room, in beautiful Pacific Grove, CA. Accommodates 3 adults and 2+ children. Queen bed in bedroom, Pull-out queen sofa bed in living room, and day bed in bonus room. 10 min. walk to beautiful Asilomar Beach with white sand, gorgeous views, and amazing dog beach.Located between Monterey and Carmel on a large (1/4 acre) forested lot with a play set and fire pit. Just a few min. drive to the entrance gate of scenic, 17 Mile Drive. Pet friendly.

The space
Charming 1935 cottage located in the Coastal Zone of Pacific Grove. The cottage has a full size washer and dryer and fully equipped kitchen with a separate dining room. The kitchen has pots/pans, bake ware, dishes, silverware, coffee pot, microwave, toaster, and a hot/cold purified drinking water dispenser. There is a television in the living room and one in the bedroom. Both TVs have Rokus, which are already signed in to Netflicks and Hulu. Fireplace can be use
host_about: We fell in love with Pacific Grove while attending the annual Monterey Car week in 2015. We purchased two PG homes later that year, and last year we obtained a short term rental license for the cottage house. We live in Santa Clarita, CA with our 9 year old daughter. We stay in Pacific Grove as often as possible : )

name: Rosedale Inn & Suites - King Suite
description:
Rosedale Inn is an intimate, modern hotel in Pacific Grove – a romantic city in the heart of Monterey County. We offer a seamless mix of friendly service, warm hospitality and comfortable rooms that make you feel right at home. Designed for romantic getaways, family vacations and business retreats, our unique hotel is the perfect place to work, unwind and play.

The space
Enjoy this spacious suite featuring 1 king bed with luxury bedding, sofa, coffee maker, refrigerator, microwave, separate living area, in-room Jacuzzi tub, fireplace, patio, work desk, flat screen TV, Dish Network w/ premium channels, free Wi-Fi and complimentary extended continental breakfast.

Guest access
This property is a hotel. Guests have access to their private guest room, breakfast room, lobby and patio/deck.

neighborhood_overview: Pacific Grove is a very quiet seaside town with excellent restaurants within walking distance from Seven Gables, a biking and hiking trail running for miles along the oceanfront and spectacular natural scenery.  Pacific Grove and Monterey are right next to each other.  Carmel is just a short 5 mile drive away.
host_about:
The Seven Gables Inn is personally managed by our family. 

Our Inn welcomed its first guests in 1982 and since then, we have enjoyed every aspect of Innkeeping. 

For all reservation questions please feel free to send us a message as we will respond as soon as possible. 

We boast a total 25 individually decorated guest rooms, each with their own private bathroom and many with private outside entrances that only you would use. 

Every one of our lovely rooms have views of the Monterey Bay and the beautiful Monterey Peninsula coastline. 

Each room has a Keurig beverage maker.

Greeting you upon arrival is a complimentary Wine Welcome package with a nice bottle of wine/sparkling cider and fun snacks.

We gladly anticipate the wishes of our guests and endeavor to make your visit to Seven Gables Inn one that you will always remember. 

—Your hosts, Susan Flatley Wheelwright, Ed Flatley and JR Wheelwright

name: Sallie’s Cottage
description: Wake up feeling inspired by the cheerful interior of this colorful home. The historic residence features beamed cathedral ceilings, eclectic furnishings and decor, contrasting textures and patterns throughout, a private yard, and a deck for dining.
neighborhood_overview: The house is very close to downtown and the beach, an easy walk in either direction. The neighborhood is full of quaint historic buildings, shops, and restaurants. There is plenty of on street, also off-street parking for one car in the driveway.
host_about:
I'm an architect, with with a background in design, land planning and historic preservation. I have a passion for nature, family, dogs, horses, travel and adventures.

My husband Tom is an ecologist, coastal biologist and park planner. Obviously, he is also a lover of nature!

Together Tom and I have painstakingly restored two historic houses in Pacific Grove... Including our 120 year old Airbnb cottage, which we started more than 30 years ago.

We've traveled the world together and separately, drawn to near and distant locations by friends,  culture, waves, and whimsy.

Airbnb hosting has allowed me to share the cottage that I love with people who enjoying it as I do. It is a genuine pleasure meeting the terrific people who visit on their adventures!

For our travelers safety Luxevaca and Myvho are meeting all OSHA Hotel and Lodging regulations. As well as ozonating our homes to kill all bacteria and virus in the air!
Imagine felling the Ocean Breeze reclining on a sofa of this luxury of the Mediterranean contemporary Villa, Located in the popular Beach Tract area and in front of the Golf Course in Pacific Grove, a block to the beautiful Monterey Bay, this very large four bedroom, three and a half bath, uniquely modernist yet ultimately California developed home, brand new built-in 2018. This modern architecture boasts large front windows of the split-level living room, separate dining area and two suites on the main floor. A spacious attached three car garage and private large lot with gorgeous views of the Golf Course and Ocean, Second level has the master suite and guest room, all within a 1/2 block to the beach and in the sought after Pacific Grove School District.
